DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine impact lifestyle intervention gestational weight gain , postpartum weight loss , secondary outcome relative usual care control group .
DOC.detailed_description: Our study address follow specific aim : ( 1 ) examine impact lifestyle intervention gestational weight gain postpartum weight loss overweight obese woman , ( 2 ) examine impact intervention physical activity ( PA ) , dietary intake , quality life ( QOL ) , ( 3 ) examine race difference total gestational weight gain , PA , dietary intake , QOL ; ( 4 ) examine impact intervention offspring adiposity .
